The code

Here I will describe the layout of the code from a high level perspective.

The application is composed of three layers.

CLI

A Shell (bash v4+) based application that does all of the heavy lifting. Learn more…

API

A Flask (python 3.6+) REST API wrapper for easier interaction with the CLI. Learn more…

GUI

A ReactJS (ECMAScript 6+) based app that drives the API from the browser. Learn more…

Compatibility

I aimed to write this code to be as platform independent as possible. However, this does not run on Windows. Currently the code must be developed on a Debian based version of linux. The code can be expanded to run on Mac OS X if the mac is upgraded to run bash version 4 or greater. The code base also requires small changes to detect whether or not use brew or apt-get to install packages locally. I currently do not have plans to implement this feature as it will not provide much benefit.
